docs.text: !!! abstract "Descricao do Item (ID: 984)"     Mysterious Metal known as the Metal of the Gods. It is harder than anything and can cause great destruction when transformed into weapons.     Used to strengthen Level 3 Weapons and Level 4 Weapons.     Type: Forging Material     Weight: 20
